pageProduct.name: Alkira Brightening Radiant Facial Moisturiser 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Hyper Hydrators + Brightening Botanicals + Antioxidants + EFAs + Nourishing Butters. A unique complex of five Australian native extracts purposeful picked to deliver an intensive shot of stable vitamin C and antioxidants paired with nourishing butters and a gentle hit of salicylic acid.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Contains one of the world’s richest sources of vitamin C, Kakadu Plum paired with Quandong and Finger Lime Caviar to break down pigmentation and promote a radiant complexion. • Citric acids to encourage skin rejuvenation, to help inhibit the appearance of pigmented spots and to unclog pores • Potent plant derived antioxidants from Davidson Plum – containing phenolic acids and flavone glycosides to promote skin elasticity through enhanced collagen and elastin production. • Complexion correcting Turmeric and purifying Bilberry and Willow Bark extract containing Salicylic Acid to encourage natural exfoliation and slow the sign of oxidative stress. • Antioxidant rich super fruits of Pomegranate and Goji • Nourishing Shea, Cocoa, Cucumber, Rice Bran and Aloe Vera will leave skin soft and protected.

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Fruit Extract, Citrus Australasica (Finger Lime) Fruit Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus (Bilberry) Fruit Extract, Salix Alba (Willow Bark) Bark Extract, Acronychia Acidula (Lemon Aspen) Fruit Extract, Davidsonia Jerseyana (Davidson Plum) Fruit Extract, Barbarum (Goji) Fruit Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran, Caffeine, Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Water (Aqua), Xanthan Gum, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*

Directions

After cleansing, gently massage into face, neck and décolletage
